item.title: Love2d Policy
item.description: That’s one todo off the list. Tonight I knocked up a proposed standard for packaging love2d games in Debian. This is the first technical, contributary, positive, evening activity I’ve been able to perform for a few months. That’ll be the drugs then. :)
